title: I got reported, and its RIOT" fault!
body: So, me and my brother were in the middle of a game and he said he got hit with lag hard the same time I did. Well LoL closed on my computer by itself and he said everyone on our team typed in all chat to report me. How is this even a legit report when it's not my fault its RIOT' fault? Then when I tried to log back in I got this message.  (screenshot attached)
